entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
